gft.api
Interface OrderUpdateListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderUpdateAdapter
public interface OrderUpdateListener

The listener interface for receiving order update events. The class that is interested in processing an order update event implements this interface (and all the methods it contains). The listener object created from that class is then registered with a Session using the its addOrderUpdateListener method.

Methods of this interface must return quickly, othrwise they will block the stream of asynchronious events.

Author:
Boris Malkin
See Also:
Session.addOrderUpdateListener(OrderUpdateListener listener), Session.removeOrderUpdateListener(OrderUpdateListener listener)
